name: THE FORGIVENESS SET - Opening and healing your heart
description:
The Forgiveness set encourages the deep exploration and self-love required to confront and free ourselves from the wrongs and pains that trouble us. The three sprays help create healthy boundaries instead of isolating walls in our relationships.

The three 2 oz sprays make a great gift set.

PINK, the energy of unconditional love, nurtures the heart chakra. 
Honor, nurture and accept yourself unconditionally and love will surround you. Pink softens energy,  opening the heart to kindness and compassion.

CORAL is inter-connectedness and harmonizes the sacral and root chakras. We are all one. Coral establishes a balance between compassion,  healthy boundaries and forgiveness in both community and relationships.

GOLD, the color of wisdom, aligns the sacral and solar plexus chakras. Insist on freedom and health by breaking patterns that no longer serve you. Gold is the discovery within yourself of courage, serenity and flexibility.

name: Original 8 Bottle Color Set (20% Savings)
description:
Made with organic natural colors, organic and wild-crafted essential oils, and vibrational essences from gemstones, these color energized sprays are specifically designed to harmonize and balance your aura and your personal environment. Each spray is designed to clear space and to activate, balance and protect your personal aura. Made in small batches during peak astrological times with the guidance and influence of archetypal and angelic beings.

PINK
Honor, nurture and accept yourself unconditionally and love will surround you. Pink softens energy, opening the heart to kindness and compassion.

RED
Activate your will with a strong connection to the Earth. Red supports issues around manifestation, work and survival. 

ORANGE
By actively letting go, we move towards understanding. Orange brings laughter, independence, sensuality and pleasure. 

YELLOW
Self-empowerment will bring focus and confidence. Just as living things absorb sunshine, yellow warms your core and helps you assimilate new information readily and joyously.

GREEN
Uncover your heart's desire to find the path that leads to abundant fertility and growth. Green helps you to freely give, receive and trust, allowing the universe to support you. 

BLUE
Uncover your heart's desire to find the path that leads to abundant fertility and growth. Green helps you to freely give, receive and trust, allowing the universe to support you. 

PURPLE
An open mind heals by transforming negatives to positives, allowing room for new ideas and perspectives. Purple calms the mind for meditation and sets intention of ritual and magic.

WHITE
Detoxify personal space and discharge stagnant energy with an infusion of white light. Cleanse your aura every day, at home and when traveling. Wonderful for use by practitioners before and after healing sessions.

name: NEW Color Oils Full set
description:
Aunt Vi's Color Oils are high frequency, magical blends holding the energy of the colors to bring their benefits into your life.

Powerful in all rituals, they are ready to use as a perfume, for charging candles, anointing chakras, diluting in a healing bath, your favorite lotion and more. 

These oils support each of the chakras...the energy centers that influence the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual aspects of our lives.

Aunt Vi's blends are made from 100% pure essential oils. 


THE COLORS

AUNT VI'S RED OIL helps us stay grounded and manifest energy into the physical realm. It supports our Root Chakra, the foundation for money magic, love, passion and magnetic attraction.

For money magic, red combined with green and orange helps with direction, manifestation and abundance.

RED OIL CONTAINS: Pure essential oils of ylang ylang & cinnamon and organic jojoba oil.


AUNT VI'S ORANGE OIL is stabilizing, nurturing and sensual. It supports inner freedom, independence and enlightenment. Energizing the Sacral Chakra, Orange helps us get our deep creative juices flowing.

AUNT VI'S ORANGE OIL contains: Pure essential oils of sweet orange & patchouli and organic jojoba oil


AUNT VI'S YELLOW OIL uplifts and brings the joyful energy of the sun. It transforms doubt and sadness to confidence and positivity. Yellow supports learning, alertness, memory and the assimilation of knowledge. 

YELLOW OIL CONTAINS: Pure essential oils of petigrain, grapefruit & bergamot and organic jojoba oil


AUNT VI'S GREEN OIL helps us create the inner and outer space we need to find our heart's desire. It helps us release the obstacles and blockages to finding and trusting our path. Green opens the heart chakra, allowing us to give and receive freely. 

AUNT VI'S GREEN OIL contains: Pure essential oils of rosemary, lime & geranium and organic jojoba oil


AUNT VI'S BLUE OIL neutralizes stress with calm and tranquility. Perfect to use liberally in the bath and diffusers, it brings peace to all situations and supports a good night sleep.

AUNT VI'S BLUE OIL: Pure essential oils of lavender & clary sage and organic jojoba oil


AUNT VI'S INDIGO OIL helps us tune into our dreams and intuition, opening the Third Eye and bringing clarity to our inner mind and aligning our unconscious with our conscious. Indigo protects our sensitive and vulnerable psychic energy. It is also very calming for kids with ADHD and hyperactivity and can be used in the bath (6-10 drops).

AUNT VI'S INDIGO OIL contains: Pure essential oils of cedarwood & lavender and organic jojoba oil


AUNT VI'S PURPLE OIL supports meditation, Yoga, prayer and any spiritual environment. The Purple oil includes one of the highest frequency oils, Frankincense, which cleanses and opens the crown chakra. The color of holy spaces, it is perfect for anointing candles.

AUNT VI'S PURPLE OIL contains: Pure essential oils of lavender & frankincense and organic jojoba oil


AUNT VI'S CLEAR OIL can be used in a diffuser as a smokeless alternative to Sage, detoxing, purifying and cleansing negative energy.   Along with a clear space, it brings the white light of mental clarity, heightened alertness and renewal.

AUNT VI'S CLEAR OIL contains: Pure essential oils of peppermint, tea tree & juniper and organic jojoba oil

name: GREEN - PROSPERITY & ABUNDANCE - affirmation: "My greatest good is coming to me now"
description:
Uncover your heart's desire to find the path that leads to abundant fertility and growth. Green helps you to freely give, receive and trust, allowing the universe to support you. 

OPEN THE HEART CHAKRA

When we follow the path of heart, the path that supports our true nature, we begin to trust ourselves to make the necessary decisions that help us become balanced, prosperous and harmonious beings. Use this essence to remind you to listen to your feelings and to keep you directed and committed to fulfilling your heart's desire, whether it relates to another or to your own purpose. This essence is infused with Emerald and Malachite and contains the pure essential oils of Rosemary, Lime and Geranium.

name: Red Oil
description:
AUNT VI'S RED OIL helps us stay grounded and manifest energy into the physical realm. It supports our Root Chakra, the foundation for money magic, love, passion and magnetic attraction.

For money magic, red combined with green and orange helps with direction, manifestation and abundance.


AUNT VI'S COLOR OILS are high frequency, magical blends holding the energy of the colors to bring their benefits into your life.

Powerful in all rituals, they are ready to use as a perfume, for charging candles, anointing chakras, diluting in a healing bath, your favorite lotion and more. 

These oils support each of the chakras...the energy centers that influence the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual aspects of our lives.

Aunt Vi's blends are made from 100% pure essential oils. 


RED OIL CONTAINS: Pure essential oils of ylang ylang & cinnamon and organic jojoba oil.

RED OIL should be used sparingly in a bath, (3-5 drops).

name: NEW LOVE - affirmation: "I am ready to share my heart"
description:
The combination of pink, green and red is a potent combination for attracting new love into your life.

The three 2 oz sprays make a great gift set.

PINK is sensual. It softens and surrounds your aura with beauty and the energy of love and attractiveness.

GREEN, the color of new growth, opens the heart chakra, helping you to more easily relate, freely give, receive and renew trust.

RED, the color of passion and magnetism, stabilizing your root chakra, the foundation of your body and sexuality.

name: WHITE - PURIFYING & CLEANSING - affirmation: "I am clear and focused"
description:
Detoxify personal space and discharge stagnant energy with an infusion of white light. Cleanse your aura every day, at home and when traveling. Wonderful for use by practitioners before and after healing sessions.

CLEANS THE CHAKRAS

This clear essence contains Juniper oil, a folk remedy to dispel and purify negative spirits. It is infused with Clear Quartz and Diamond essences and also has the antibacterial and refreshing oils of Tea tree and Peppermint. Use this essence to regularly cleanse, protect and renew your home and surroundings.

name: Orange Oil
description:
AUNT VI'S ORANGE OIL is stabilizing, nurturing and sensual. It supports inner freedom, independence and enlightenment. Energizing the Sacral Chakra, Orange helps us get our deep creative juices flowing.

For money magic, used with red and green, it helps with direction, manifestation and abundance.


AUNT VI'S COLOR OILS are high frequency, magical blends holding the energy of the colors to bring their benefits into your life.

Powerful in all rituals, they are ready to use as a perfume, for charging candles, anointing chakras, diluting in a healing bath, your favorite lotion and more. 

These oils support each of the chakras...the energy centers that influence the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual aspects of our lives.

AUNT VI'S ORANGE OIL contains: Pure essential oils of sweet orange & patchouli and organic jojoba oil

ORANGE OIL should be used sparingly in a bath, (2-4 drops).

name: Yellow Oil
description:
AUNT VI'S YELLOW OIL uplifts and brings the joyful energy of the sun. It transforms doubt and sadness to confidence and positivity. Yellow supports learning, alertness, memory and the assimilation of knowledge. 


AUNT VI'S COLOR OILS are high frequency, magical blends holding the energy of the colors to bring their benefits into your life.

Powerful in all rituals, they are ready to use as a perfume, for charging candles, anointing chakras, diluting in a healing bath, your favorite lotion and more.

name: Mercury Retrograde Balancer
description:
WHAT IT DOES:

The Mercury Retrograde Balancer Spray helps influence the powerful positive and negative mental and energetic effects of Mercury Retrograde. 

Our unique blend of pure essential oils, flower, gem and elemental vibrational essences provides a simple way to help create an aware and stable environment before, during and after Mercury Retrograde. 

Awareness can help reduce the frustrations and aggravations that are typically associated with the retrograde period. To keep from being knocked off center, it’s important to be prepared in advance for the challenging aspects. Similarly, recognizing the potential of the retrograde helps us to take advantage of the aspect and accomplish more.


WHAT'S IN THE FORMULA?

Everything in the Mercury Retrograde is pure and natural and imbued with love and attention.

The pure essential oils of Peppermint and Lavender balance each other to provide both stimulating and relaxing energy. The Peppermint helps with alertness, uplifting and providing mental clarity. Like the planet Mercury, it can be simultaneously hot and cold. Lavender is revered as a nerve tonic and has cleansing and purifying qualities. It is also relaxing and balancing to the entire energetic system.

The combination of English Flower Essences White Chestnut and Clematis help ground our thoughts and calm an over-stimulated mind. 

The Gem Essences of Ruby and Blue Topaz harmonize the 1st, 5th and 7th chakras (base, throat and crown), helping to bring ideas and thoughts (crown) into reality (base) through communication (throat).

The entire formula is infused with the electrical energy of the Elemental Essence Mercury Starlight. All of the essences are directed into the formula through attunement to the planet itself, prayer and spiritual guidance.

name: New 7 Bottle Color Set (20% savings)
description:
Made with organic natural colors, organic and wild-crafted essential oils, and vibrational essences from gemstones, these color energized sprays are specifically designed to harmonize and balance your aura and your personal environment. Each spray is designed to clear space and to activate, balance and protect your personal aura. Made in small batches during peak astrological times with the guidance and influence of archetypal and angelic beings.

CORAL
We are all one. Coral establishes a balance between compassion, healthy boundaries and forgiveness in both community and relationships.

GOLD
Insist on freedom and health by breaking patterns that no longer serve you. Gold is the discovery within yourself of courage, serenity and flexibility.

OLIVE
A brave heart leads for the good of all. Olive is hope for the future and trust in humanity. By connecting with what you know in your heart to be true, you will be able to act upon it.

TURQUOISE
The new age is creative communication from the heart through art and media. Turquoise supports writing, public speaking and innovation as well as interests as diverse as crystal healing and technology.

INDIGO
Achieve open communication of spirit by activating the sixth sense. Indigo connects the spiritual to the physical, helping both psychics and new age children to focus. 

MAGENTA
Bring the miracles of heaven to Earth by connecting the spiritual to the physical. Magenta stimulates the gift of healing energy and also replenishes the reserves of the healer.

ROSE
Awaken your innate beauty by connecting to the goddess that exists within. Rose Pink celebrates and honors our mystical, feminine energy, bringing divine love to both men and women.

name: PURPLE - HEALING & TRANSFORMATION - affirmation: "I am open to miracles"
description:
An open mind heals by transforming negatives to positives, allowing room for new ideas and perspectives. Purple calms the mind for meditation and sets intention of ritual and magic.

OPEN YOUR CROWN CHAKRA

Purple represents the 7th chakra and is the gateway to our spiritual selves. It is where we intellectually and intuitively understand and heal loneliness, grief and negative thought patterns. Awareness of the power of our thoughts and words allows our higher guidance to assume the responsibility for our personal transformations. This pure Sandalwood and Lavender scented essence has the infusions of Sugilite and Amethyst to help turn negatives into positives! Excellent before meditation and/or bedtime to calm mental over-activity.

name: ROSE  - DIVINE LOVE - affirmation: "I am beautiful"
description:
Awaken your innate beauty by connecting to the goddess that exists within. Rose Pink celebrates and honors our mystical, feminine energy, bringing divine love to both men and women.

HARMONIZE THE CROWN, HEART & ROOT CHAKRAS

Rose pink helps us find and express our internal and external beauty. The mystical and gorgeous aromas of Sandalwood and Rose pure essential oils, energized with the angelic influences of Fluorite and Kunzite crystals, opens us to the abundant and generous goddess energy that dwells within each of us. An inspired and positive self-consciousness helps us to accept and receive divine love from above, releasing fears associated with beauty and intimacy. Rose Pink helps us let our radiant and sensual selves shine.

name: RED - ENERGY & GROUNDING - affirmation: "I say yes to life"
description:
Activate your will with a strong connection to the Earth. Red supports issues around manifestation, work and survival. 

STABILIZE THE ROOT CHAKRA

The red aura spray, infused with the energy of Rubies and Garnets, contains the pure essential oils of Ylang Ylang and Cinnamon. It restores vital earth energy by awakening the root chakra and activating all of the body's energy centers. Red strengthens our foundation, providing stability, like the roots of a tree. When our energies are floundering, or we feel depleted, drained and unmotivated, this essence grounds spirit and helps us to achieve goals in the material world.

name: OLIVE - BRAVE HEART - affirmation: "I am listening with my heart"
description:
A brave heart leads for the good of all. Olive is hope for the future and trust in humanity. By connecting with what you know in your heart to be true, you will be able to act upon it.

CONNECT THE HEART & SOLAR PLEXUS CHAKRAS

With Olive, we act from the intuitive wisdom of our heart. The color of hope and perseverance, Olive connects us to nature’s ways, helping us to be patient as we nurture new relationships, ideas and projects. The mineral essences of Peridot and Chrysocolla combined with the refreshing forest-like aroma of Scotch Pine and Rosemary essential oils help us open the bars of protection that can surround a broken and fearful heart. Olive balances us and invites the radical forgiveness that trust demands.

name: PINK - UNCONDITIONAL LOVE - affirmation: "I love and accept myself"
description:
Honor, nurture and accept yourself unconditionally and love will surround you. Pink softens energy, opening the heart to kindness and compassion.

NURTURE THE HEART CHAKRA

Surround yourself with the blessings of pure Rose Absolute and the essence of Rose Quartz. Pink helps us to address issues relating both to our body image and how we care for the self. Pink encourages us to love ourselves just as we are. Love, the most powerful energy of all, helps us heal emotional wounds through unconditional acceptance and understanding. This essence encourages harmony and kindness in relationship and during group and family activities.

name: CORAL - INTER-CONNECTEDNESS - affirmation: "I forgive myself and others"
description:
We are all one. Coral establishes a balance between compassion, healthy boundaries and forgiveness in both community and relationships.

HARMONIZE THE SACRAL & ROOT CHAKRAS

Dwelling in the sacred and compassionate space of coral’s love and wisdom, we can forgive ourselves and others. Coral helps us with relationships; letting go of unhealthy, co-dependent patterns; transforming unrequited love; and healing deep family hurts. With coral, we establish healthy personal boundaries and express and receive love without fear. Coral contains the universal energy of rhodochrosite and pyrite with the comforting and familiar aroma of vanilla and pink grapefruit.

name: ORANGE - ENLIGHTENMENT - affirmation: "I am here now"
description:
By actively letting go, we move towards understanding. Orange brings laughter, independence, sensuality and pleasure. 

NURTURE THE SACRAL CHAKRA

Orange relates to the second chakra where we assimilate what we need from life and let go of what we don't. Use this Carnelian and Amber infused essence, scented with pure essential oils of Sweet Orange and Patchouli, when absorbing something new or moving through a new stage of development. With the energy of orange, day to day experiences, creatively turned into wisdom, are then translated into active enlightenment.

name: GOLD - WISDOM - affirmation: "I am healthy and happy"
description:
Insist on freedom and health by breaking patterns that no longer serve you. Gold is the discovery within yourself of courage, serenity and flexibility.

HARMONIZE THE SACRAL & SOLAR PLEXUS CHAKRAS

With the euphoric combination of Jasmine and Tangerine and the centering mineral vibrations of Orange Calcite and Tigers Eye, the gold color essence helps us open to our higher intelligence so we can enjoy our personal power and live from our deepest integrity. When Gold helps our solar plexus loosen its grip, we break through old patterns of self-criticism and judgment, transforming anxiety, doubt, fear and confusion into powerful insight and inner strength.  Remember healer, heal thyself and align with your “inner teacher.”

name: YELLOW - HAPPINESS - affirmation: "I am joyful and confident"
description:
Self-empowerment will bring focus and confidence. Just as living things absorb sunshine, yellow warms your core and helps you assimilate new information readily and joyously.

EMPOWER THE SOLAR PLEXUS CHAKRA

The solar plexus chakra is the source of our personal power and the center of our electrical system. This is the point where most people get blocked, caught up in either their higher (spiritual) or lower (physical) chakras. When we first breakthrough this block, we may feel fear, depression and anxiety. This yellow essence is infused with the energy of Gold and Citrine and contains the pure essential oils of Bergamot, Grapefruit and Petigrain. It encourages joyous experience and self-confidence.

name: TURQUOISE - CREATIVITY & FLOW - affirmation: "I choose to be free"
description:
The new age is creative communication from the heart through art and media. Turquoise supports writing, public speaking and innovation as well as interests as diverse as crystal healing and technology.

EXPAND THE THROAT & HEART CHAKRAS

Turquoise unlocks the ananda khanda chakra, also known as “the wishing well of the heart,” where we store our most treasured dreams. Opening this door between the throat and the heart inspires our true creative expression. Turquoise connects us to the future, the “new age” of Aquarius, and supports our experience with art, media, public speaking and anything that involves technology and communication. The synergy of Sapphire, Aventurine and Quartz crystal essences combined with the spiritual aroma of Frankincense and Myrrh cleanses the subtle bodies, helps us slow down, deepen our breath and return to this sacred place in our hearts.

name: BLUE - PEACE & COMMUNICATION - affirmation: "I am a channel for peace"
description:
Find the peace that comes with truth and clarity by listening to your inner voice and intuition. The pure blue of peace calms the throat, releases stress and strengthens communication by supporting the balance between hearing and sharing.

CALM THE THROAT CHAKRA

Communication is the key to working with others peacefully. Difficulties in communication are often a result of past challenges with authority figures and institutions. Messages such as children should be seen and not heard, create obstacles to integrating a healthy masculine nature. Blue teaches us that it is OK to speak up and assert our own personal authority while at the same time creating a calm throat center from which to speak. This essence contains the cooling nature of Aquamarine and Azurite and the calming, stress-relieving pure essential oils of Lavender and Clary Sage. This is a perfect spray for businesspeople.

name: INDIGO - PROTECTION & INTUITION - affirmation: "I am grounded and safe"
description:
Achieve open communication of spirit by activating the sixth sense. Indigo connects the spiritual to the physical, helping both psychics and new age children to focus. 

LISTEN TO YOUR THIRD EYE

Originally formulated for new age children known as the “indigos,” the Indigo essence spray provides spiritual protection from negative energies, helping us feel safer receiving love and support from the environment. Perfect for meditation, interpreting dreams and for bringing clarity to night visions, indigo helps deliver messages from the sub-conscious. For spiritual counselors, this essence helps tune into 3rd eye intuition, a “higher” perspective and divine knowledge, supporting clairvoyance and psychic awareness. The combination of Covellite and Lapis gem essences and Cedarwood and Lavender pure essential oils stimulates brain function and mental synergy to help the body rewire old patterns into healthier new ones.

name: MAGENTA - SANCTUARY - affirmation: "I am re-generating"
description:
Bring the miracles of heaven to Earth by connecting the spiritual to the physical. Magenta stimulates the gift of healing energy and also replenishes the reserves of the healer.

REPLENISH THE CHAKRAS

Comfort yourself with deep magenta. Connecting heaven and earth and bringing spirituality into action, this color essence bridges the crown (purple) and root (red) chakras to inspire a profound sense of divine love and stability. Soothing deep anxiety, stress and exhaustion, dark magenta reminds the healers and caretakers of the world to remember the beauty of everyday things and to care for themselves, especially when caring for others. Scepter Amethyst and Smoky Quartz gem essences, combined with the blessed soul stirring inhalations of Spikenard and Rosewood pure essential oils, inspire increased awareness of life purpose and support the healing of emotional, psychological and physical wounds.
